Town Hall
=========

1755 Main Street Providence Village TX 76227

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1755+Main+Street+Providence+Village+TX+76227)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

1755 Main Street  
Providence Village, TX 76227

Phone:

[940-365-9333](tel:9403659333)

[Email Town Hall](mailto:permits@pvtx.gov)  
  

Hours  
Monday through Thursday  
8:30 am to 4:30 pm

Friday  
8:30 am to 12:30 pm
